text: aur jo log kahate hain ki ham nasaraanee hain unase (bhee) hamane eemaan ka ehad (va paimaan) liya tha magar jab jin jin baaton kee unhen naseehat kee gayee thee unamen se ek bada hissa (risaalat) bhula baithe to hamane bhee (usakee saza mein) qayaamat tak unamen baaham adaavat va dushamanee kee buniyaad daal dee aur khuda unhen bahut jald (qayaamat ke din) bata dega ki vah kya kya karate the
